body.name: TOKAXI 1/36 Scale Mercedes Benz AMG GTS Diecast Cars Models,Pull Back Vehicles Toy Cars,Cars Gifts for Boys Girls (Black)
features: High-Quality Materials:The Mercedes Benz GTS die-cast car is made of zinc alloy,plastic parts and rubber tires,making it safe for children to play with.It features detailed interior and exterior trim, and is very sturdy.

Function:No batteries are required, but the vehicle has a powerful pull back feature. Simply pull it back, then release your hand, and the car will go for a long distance. The doors may be opened to view the whole inside of the vehicle. So appealing to children and collectors alike.

Size:1/36 scale vehicle model with beautiful English packaging,ideal for toddlers to play with and carry. Car collectors will appreciate the perfect small size, which allows them to collect a complete set of cars without taking up too much space.
Grow From Play:Help children learn more about car ,expand their knowledge ,increase the hand-eye coordination and the reaction speed of the children in the play.

Ideal Christmas Festival Gift:All of TOKAXI die-cast model cars are attractively packaged in English, making them the perfect Christmas, Birthday, Children's Day, New Year gift for kids, party favors, home decorations, or travel toys for boys and girls.gifts for boys girls.
body.description: TOKAXI Die-cast model cars are made of high-quality alloy materials and are miniature replicas of real cars. These car toys are small enough for kids' hands to handle, made cutely and easy to control. They're very handy to carry wherever you go. This car doesn't require batteries- just pull it back and watch it go! This is a great way to help children exercise their hand-eye coordination and reaction speed. The car door is designed to open separately, making it easy for children to learn about cars. The realistic interior decoration is also enjoyable and educational. You can use it as an ornament in your home or put it on your car to show your appreciation for art. This pull-back car is not just a toy for kids but also a nice addition to enthusiasts' car model collection. We have a wide selection of cars to choose from, so you can find the perfect one for your collection from our products. All of TOKAXI die-cast model cars are attractively packaged in English, making them the perfect Christmas, Birthday, Children's Day, New Year gift for kids, party favors, home decorations, or travel toys for boys and girls.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.2 4.2 out of 5 stars 23 ratings 4.2 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this as a gag gift for my husband for his birthday. He has always wanted a Mercedes. He loved it and keeps it on his desk. Will be a perfect toy for my grandson when he visits.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My grandson loves it
reviews.reviewText: I buy these pull back cars for my grandson when I visit and he loves them. They go pretty fast and straight. We race them down the hallway! Color is bright. Doors open and close easily, which my grandson is obsessed with testing out. I will buy again, and again. My grandson is counting on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice, but too small
reviews.reviewText: Nice! Maybe I didn’t check the size in the description…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Product was used.
reviews.reviewText: The toy was clearly used. It was put in the original packaging, but there was no clamshell or anything else in the box to keep it in place. The box was very torn up looking. The toy car had finger prints all over it, and the paint is chipped across the front. I felt awful when this was opened up as a holiday gift that was meant to go on display with a collection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Muy buena escala

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I thought the car was very cute and great quality but I didn’t realize how tiny it was.
